General.Name: Guangdong Kinlong Hardware Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong KinLong Hardware Products Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of construction and building accessories products in China. The company offers arm bracket, embedded channel system, hanging bracket, and anti-seismic supporting systems; galfan cables, high-strength tie rods, and alloy casting products; and door controls, mechanical locks, smart locks, stainless steel products, floor products, bathroom fittings, and post railing systems. It also provides point-fixed glass wall fittings, and anchoring products; and U-groove door and window accessories, aluminum and home decoration doors, door and window hardware accessories, and sealing system products. In addition, the company offers safety shoes, belts, and helmets; protective gloves, respirators, and masks; jackets; reflective vests; work packages; masking film, foam, paper, wrapping film, PE, and masking tapes; explosion-proof, street, commercial, and solar lights; fence tubes; spotlights; pipes; electric sweeper cars; socket switches; and driving and hand push type washing machines. Further, it provides aluminum warehouse platform, aluminum hinge and single ladders, joint ladders, and insulated extension and hinge ladders. Additionally, the company offers smart locks, window operating system, and video surveillance system. It also exports its products. Guangdong KinLong Hardware Products Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: No.3, Jian Lang Road, Dongguan, China, 523722
